content:
Persons interviewed:

/1/ Mr. An Jiaji Plant Manger of the PP

/2/. Mr. Huang Shifu Staff of the PP

/3/. Mr. Xu Guoliang Consultant of Longyuan (Beijing) Carbon Asset Management Technology Co. Ltd.

/4/ Mr. Guo Wei Consultant of Longyuan (Beijing) Carbon Asset Management Technology Co. Ltd.

: VERIFIED Vi ( S | CARBSN STANDAR

VERIFICATION REPORT: vcs version 3

CURRICULA VITAE OF THE DOE’S VERIFICATION TEAM MEMBERS

Mr.Tony Li Xingtong Bureau Veritas Certification, China Team Leader, Climate Change Lead Verifier. He holds a Master Degree in Landscape Ecology and Bachelor Degree in Environmental Engineering. Before joining BV in 2009, he gained one year of CDM technical experience in P.R China. He obtained the certificate of CDM Verifier, Lead Auditor for ISO 14001 and has successfully completed the course assessment for the ISO 14064:2006.

Mr.Ernesto Tan Wenbin Bureau Veritas Certification, China Technical Reviewer Climate Change Lead Verifier. He holds a bachelor degree in Geology and a master degree in Structural Geology. Before joining BV, he gained more than 2 years’ technical experience in Petroleum Exploitation and Storage & Transportation sector, and more than 3 year’s technical experiences in coal mining sector in P.R China. He obtained the certificate of CDM Lead Verifier and Lead Auditor for ISO 14001.
